short_summary: Notification of the contract award notice for a sleeping bags contract as a result of advancement through the pre-general-tender procedure.
full_summary:
# ***Sleeping Bag CF188 SSK Tender Notice***

---

## Tender Details

**Reference Number:** cb-177-33317523
**Submission Deadline:** July 26, 2024, 14:00:00
**Contract Start Date:** July 29, 2024
**Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Request for Offer

The Department of Defense has published a request for offer (RFO) for the procurement of Sleeping bags, part number CF188 SSK.

## Project Description

The project involves the procurement of 25 Sleeping bags for the Montreal location (25 CFSD Montreal) and 25 Sleeping bags for the Edmonton location (7 CFSD Edmonton) by December 2024. The Sleeping bag part number is ID-08-280, and the NCAGE code is L09L7.

## Compliance with GST/ HST

Bidders must indicate whether their bid includes GST/HST payable.

## Evaluation Criteria

All bids will be evaluated in accordance with the criteria specified in the solicitation documents.

## Communication Requirements

Electronic submissions are strongly encouraged via the epost Connect service.

## Tender Submission

The tender submission deadline is July 26, 2024, 14:00:00. Documents must be submitted in either English or French. 

## Contact Information

For any queries regarding this Request for Tender, please contact Dany Lebel, phone (000) 000-0000, email [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca).

---

## Attachments

* [French and English announcment and addendum](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42133/w8485-258220-b---sleeping-bag-acan.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42133/w8485-258220-b---sac-de-couchage-pac.pdf)
*
## Statutory References

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
